steps.name: user is logging-in with sehajpreet2.nicholi@orperfect.com hqqps2J$
he should be redirected to the home page
he selects Chaise de Bureau Ergonomique
he fills in the quantity of the product to add via icons - and +
he clicks on add to cart
User fills fields with 4242 4242 4242 4242, 12 / 23, 520 and 204 Rue Manga-bell
